ygData.subject: getting new friends
ygData.msgSnippet: Kit, I do indeed know your pain.  In fact I have actually begun to cultivate a lets see if we can keep the Bard alive mentality amoungst our group. Actually
ygData.messageBody:
Kit,

I do indeed know your pain. In fact I have actually begun to cultivate a
"lets see if we can keep the Bard alive" mentality amoungst our group.
Actually I have little or no attention from Mobs these days since our Ranger
and Monk can out damage me to the point even chains doesn't taunt the mob
onto me for very long.

I had the same reaction from someone when they first say me play the bard at
the computer. They were amazed that you had to keep hitting buttons.

Rylos Darkmadrigal
Bard of the 27th Song
E'ci


<previous message>
Date: Tue, 27 Jun 2000 14:15:30 -0600
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
Subject: getting new friends

Most of my current friends are actually pretty cool. I just don't think
they understand bards despite all their exposure. Except for Rylos of
course, he knows my pain. Can't forget our Ranger/Druid's first description
of seeing someone physically playing a bard for the first time.

"Holy S#$@! You guys have to do that all the time??? That's ridiculous."

Kitasi Faegehearper
